primaryText.text:
<font size = '5'>State Name: Colorado
Abbreviation: CO
Capital: Denver
Statehood Year: 1876
Statehood Order: 38
</font>

outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>Colorado is the 38th state, admitted to the Union in 1876.  The capital of Colorado is Denver, and the abbreviation for Colorado is <break strength='strong'/><say-as interpret-as='spell-out'>CO</say-as>.  I've added Colorado to your Alexa app.  Which other state or capital would you like to know about?</speak>
<speak>Which other state or capital would you like to know about?</speak>
